Text: whats the way to play this dlc on my xbox ? but if i don't buy it will it still work ? i have forza horizon but not this dlc ..please tell me a way i could make it work ?? do i download this file put it on a pen drive  and into my xbox ? would that do it ?

it all depends on how you hacked your xbox, mine has a processer chip and i use freestyle dash 3, so i had to ftp it to my xbox into the folder for DLC content, check how yours was hacked then google it, thats the best i can tell you
